code: public void execute() {     GetAttributesRequest request = new GetAttributesRequest().withDomainName(determineDomainName()).withItemName(determineItemName()).withConsistentRead(determineConsistentRead()).withAttributeNames(determineAttributeNames()).     log.trace("Sending request [{}] for exchange [{}]...", request, exchange).     GetAttributesResult result = this.sdbClient.getAttributes(request).     log.trace("Received result [{}]", result).     Message msg = getMessageForResponse(exchange).     msg.setHeader(SdbConstants.ATTRIBUTES, result.getAttributes()). }

public static Message getMessageForResponse(final Exchange exchange) {     if (exchange.getPattern().isOutCapable()) {         Message out = exchange.getOut().         out.copyFrom(exchange.getIn()).         return out.     }     return exchange.getIn(). }
